comment: /** * Checks whether an Extended PDB ID is shortable, assuming it is a valid extended PDB ID. * @see #isValidExtendedPdbId(String) * @param extendedId the supposedly valid extended PDB ID. * @return true if extendedId can be shortened * (ie. it matches the regular expression "(pdb|PDB)_0000[1-9][a-zA-Z0-9]{3}"), false otherwise. */
